name: Marx
winning-phrases: All I do is win, win, win!
losing-phrases: How will I ever beat this guy?

name: Slippy
winning-phrases: I never doubted it for a second
losing-phrases: How can I ever show my face around here again?

name: Latree
winning-phrases: A victory is only as such if the next battle is won
The power of the mind is unparalleled
Harry Potter has nothing on me!
losing-phrases: I must return to my training...
I shall return stronger than ever!

name: J-Dog
winning-phrases: I've eaten meals bigger than that for breakfase!
losing-phrases: In my mind, I already won...
I'll never hear the end of this from Osman...

name: Osman
winning-phrases: Who knew I was that good?  Oh right, me!
losing-phrases: Maybe I need to try something else...
How can I explain this to J-Dog?
